languages.text: "Тот, кто посмеет остаться глух к нему, будет изменником веры".
"He who dares to remain deaf to the pleas of the destitute shall be branded a traitor to the faith."
languages.original_text: "Тот, кто посмеет остаться глух к нему, будет изменником веры".

traits.locale_text: "He who dares to remain deaf to his pleas shall be branded as a traitor of belief."
"He who dares to remain deaf to his pleas shall be branded as a traitor of belief."
"He who dares to remain deaf to the pleas of the destitute shall be branded a traitor to the faith."
"He who dares to remain deaf to the pleas of the destitute shall be branded a traitor to the faith."
"He who dares to remain deaf to the pleas of the destitute shall be branded a traitor to the faith."
"He who dares to remain deaf to the pleas of the destitute shall be branded a traitor to the faith."

languages.text: “谁敢对穷人的恳求充耳不闻，谁就会被视为背弃信仰的叛徒。
languages.original_text: "He who dares to remain deaf to the pleas of the destitute shall be branded a traitor to the faith."

traits.locale_text: “谁敢对穷人的恳求充耳不闻，谁就会被视为背弃信仰的叛徒。

languages.text: «Quien ose hacer oídos sordos a las súplicas de los desamparados será tachado de traidor a la fe».
languages.original_text: "He who dares to remain deaf to the pleas of the destitute shall be branded a traitor to the faith."

traits.locale_text: «Quien ose hacer oídos sordos a las súplicas de los desamparados será tachado de traidor a la fe».

languages.text: 「貧困にあえぐ者の訴えに耳を傾けようとしない者は、信仰への裏切り者として烙印を押されるであろう」
languages.original_text: "He who dares to remain deaf to the pleas of the destitute shall be branded a traitor to the faith."

traits.locale_text: 「貧困にあえぐ者の訴えに耳を傾けようとしない者は、信仰への裏切り者として烙印を押されるであろう」

languages.text: « Celui qui reste sourd aux supplications des malheureux doit être déclaré traître à la foi. »
languages.original_text: "He who dares to remain deaf to the pleas of the destitute shall be branded a traitor to the faith."

traits.locale_text: « Celui qui reste sourd aux supplications des malheureux doit être déclaré traître à la foi. »

languages.text: "Wer es wagt, das Flehen der Verzweifelten zu überhören, der wird als Verräter am Glauben gebrandmarkt."
languages.original_text: "He who dares to remain deaf to the pleas of the destitute shall be branded a traitor to the faith."

traits.locale_text: "Wer es wagt, das Flehen der Verzweifelten zu überhören, der wird als Verräter am Glauben gebrandmarkt."

languages.text: "Kim ki muhtaçların yakarışlarına kulaklarını tıkamaya cüret eder, inancın gözünde hain olarak damgalanır."
languages.original_text: "He who dares to remain deaf to the pleas of the destitute shall be branded a traitor to the faith."
